Articles.Content:
Hey guys, so I just wanted to tell you that I'm currently working on a 45 minutes long KSP movie (Of course my work is not as good as Nassault's is, but I have some experience in this field and I'm still learning). So I've already uploaded a teaser, so maybe you could give it a go and tell me what you think in the comments below the video!

PS: If you would subscribe me, I'd be even more glad, I'm just starting making YouTube videos and I hope you give me a chance.

HERE is the video.

Have a nice day, guys .
Just found out this needs to go in a sub-forum --- Does anybody know how to do that?
Actually It'll be fine here, it's not a mission report or "live from mission control" kind of thing, in fact it's really good and I'm looking forwards to seeing the end result
Well, thank you very much .
Nice! I liked the little touches like the slightly dinged up visor on Luke's helmet. I'm looking forward to the finished article too.

Bro tip! As long as you've got a good computer and graphics cards, use the Astronomers Visual Pack. Its amazing. Here is link: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220335-astronomers-visual-pack-v3-beta
I'm looking forward to this!

Bro tip! As long as you've got a good computer and graphics cards, use the Astronomers Visual Pack. Its amazing. Here is link: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220335-astronomers-visual-pack-v3-beta

I... am already using it...

Also: I just uploaded the first Making-of video. HERE

And thank you guys again, I'm trying very hard to deliver a good movie.

Edited June 4, 2014 by Aurora
Damn grammar...

Could you maybe embed the video here? Just a little matter of convenience.

And also I hate giving YouTube my traffic....

Could you maybe embed the video here? Just a little matter of convenience.

And also I hate giving YouTube my traffic....

Of course I can!

I... am already using it...

Also: I just uploaded the first Making-of video. HERE

And thank you guys again, I'm trying very hard to deliver a good movie.

Oh sorry, didnt notice when I first watched the video. Also, is it possible that you can get some reversed Spanish clips for your movie (the squad trailers do it), it sounds better than chatterer in my opinion. Edited June 4, 2014 by ThinkOutsideTheHangar

Also, is it possible that you can get some reversed Spanish clips for your movie (the squad trailers do it), it sounds better than chatterer in my opinion.

I can try, but I don't know people speaking Spanish as their native language...

I can try, but I don't know people speaking Spanish as their native language...

Maybe remix the trailer sound clips?

Maybe remix the trailer sound clips?

I can't, SQUAD owns the copyright and although I don't monetize my videos, I don't want to violate coypright laws, I wouldn't want to have my videos used without my permission, too (Of course I would allow it if people asked me, didn't tell people it's their work and linked to the original video).
Did you notice the Kerbals look like the Apollo guys with their buzz cuts and names?

Did you notice the Kerbals look like the Apollo guys with their buzz cuts and names?

I don't get it...

Hey, that looks great. But perhaps I could help you along to make it 45 minutes and on a 'nassault' level?

Here's a portfolio type thing of some of my best stuff:

Hey, that looks great. But perhaps I could help you along to make it 45 minutes and on a 'nassault' level?

Sure, that sounds nice, but I kind of need to know what you expect from this and what you can contribute to the project, maybe just send me a message and we figure things out?

PS: Saw your videos, amazing. The movie's going to be a little bit "more action" though (I'm not planning on using quotes of famous scientists).

Awesome!!! I would say that I cannot wait, but since physics will not comply with my instant gratification needs, I will and can wait. Also, I have an idea for what could happen in the movie after the scene in the trailer, unless you have it all figured out already. I recommend the crew agrees to wait until KSC can send them a fuel tanker, so that they can go to Duna. Or, KSC launches m a tanker to Duna which will rendezvous with them once they are in Duna orbit.

Hey, just wanted to say: Good luck! I really hope a game this good can get a movie deserving similar praise... If you aren't using these yet, I recommend Near-Future Propulsion, Hot Rockets and Kerbcam. The first will add new interplanetary-esque parts, the second new effects, and the third will help A LOT in filming.

Awesome!!! I would say that I cannot wait, but since physics will not comply with my instant gratification needs, I will and can wait. Also, I have an idea for what could happen in the movie after the scene in the trailer, unless you have it all figured out already. I recommend the crew agrees to wait until KSC can send them a fuel tanker, so that they can go to Duna. Or, KSC launches m a tanker to Duna which will rendezvous with them once they are in Duna orbit.

I've thought of something pretty similar.

Hey, just wanted to say: Good luck! I really hope a game this good can get a movie deserving similar praise... If you aren't using these yet, I recommend Near-Future Propulsion, Hot Rockets and Kerbcam. The first will add new interplanetary-esque parts, the second new effects, and the third will help A LOT in filming.

I'm already using Hot Rockets andd Kerbcam, I might try Near-Future propulsion.
70% of the first video done, this process will speed up because I'm still very busy with writing the story. I'm confident that I can release everything on time though.
First video finished, handing it over to ProCraftia so he can add the VFX.

https://youtu.be/Yhvn02qdou8

The first video is finally online! That was some hard work!

I just wanted to thank HatBat aka ProCraftia for the VFX, you helped so incredibly much!
This is AWESOME! Looking forward to more!
